nodes.bodyText: This line is too long, now. That's why CircleCI complains :)
Ups. Let's see if this is short enough. (I could not reproduce the error by running the checkstyle task locally, though.)

Yeah, the checkstyle gradle task only checks the things that AntennaPod already fulfills. We use diff-checkstyle on CI to gradually enforce more rules while still not doing a huge "reformatted everything" PR that messes up merges and git history. Diff-checkstyle uses the checkstyle-new-code.xml config file that can be imported in Android Studio.
Thanks for the explanation. I wasn't aware of diff-checkstyle.
